ENV4120 - Air Pollution and Hazardous Wa.name: ENV4120 - Air Pollution and Hazardous Waste Control

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EGN 3343, CWR 3201 and ENV 3001 all with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Air pollution and hazardous waste engineering. Air resources management, engineering design, and operation of air pollution control systems. Storage, collection, processing, and disposal of hazardous wastes.

Course Description.text: Introduction to concepts and terminology of environmental engineering. Stresses material and energy balances. Covers air, water and land pollution.
